Text:
Where is the finale?
Adam Richman's Best Sandwich in America S01E11 National Championship

Hi!

I have the same question as "hyk000"; does anyone know where I can find the last episode of the season (the championship finale, s01e11) of this excellent show? TVRage says it should have been broadcast on august 15th.

Thanks in advance!

Mr. Joey Buttafuoco
